website_summaries.verdict: A fair-priced bouncer from a reputable company. Simple and no-nonsense.
cons: Chunky babies may make seat sink

customer_reviews.title: Son Loooooves this Seat
customer_reviews.text: As my son got bigger, he grew out of his baby rocker but couldn't quite sit up yet. This is at a perfect incline so he can see what is going on around him but also take a nap if sleepy. The removable toy bar is perfect when I need him entertained while I do chores. The seat easily detaches and can be thrown in the wash. It was also a lifesaver when he got his first cold and ear infection; laying flat was very uncomfortable for him and this allowed him to get much needed rest during the day. Oh, and it vibrates! He'll grow out of it quickly, but for the price it is absolutely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Leeny127Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby who is just becoming more active, it moves when he does!
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 month old was tired of the seats and swings that had him lay back flat. He was ready to sit up! This seat is just what we needed: doesn't take up much space, allows him to sit more upright than some other loungers/bouncers, has toys for him to reach for (though he can't reach them yet), and has a vibration feature. The toy bar also goes on and off very easily and it's great for moving from room to room!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Belozer

customer_reviews.title: 2 month old daughter approved!
customer_reviews.text: We just received this item today and our baby girl seems super content in it! LO is 2 months old and al of a sudden wants to be upright and exploring toys etc. this little bouncer is perfect and so compact that you can carry it from room to room. Easy to assemble and super cute! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Agnieszka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for twins! Can be stacked on top of each other when not in use and the babies love them
customer_reviews.text: These bouncers are perfect for the price, ease of assembly and use, and the babies love them. I bought two of these for my grandsons. The chairs were the best investment so far. The boys love to kick their legs to make them bounce and they are in a safe location sitting up so we can talk to them both next to each other. When not in use the chairs easily stack on top of each other. I would definitely recommend these over any other more expensive chairs.
customer_reviews.author: krdcrystal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This picture is after using it for 5 months Perfect 👌 Baby is very comfortable in it
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bouncer
customer_reviews.text: Bouncers are very simple objects, so it’s hard for it to go wrong! The seat seems very comfortable and easy to clean. The design is nice and most importantly my baby likes it. The vibrations are strong enough to comfort him. We had purchased a swing for him and he hated it. So, we decided to try a bouncer and this one is perfect. I took off the toys on top for now because he’s only 2 months and isn’t interested in them. It makes it much easier to put him down and pick him up. The toys seem nice so hopefully once he starts playing with toys he will enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Luu Z

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay...
customer_reviews.text: This product bounces, holds Baby comfortably and vibrates. However, without a power light or music, I constantly forget to turn the vibration off. That being said, it doesn't suck much battery life, as I've left it on for full days before over the last few weeks, and am still only on the second battery. My daughter doesn't get much comfort from the vibration. Would work better, I think, with music. We now use it mostly as somewhere to sit her when needing our arms free for just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mom of 9
customer_reviews.text: After parenting 9 children over the past 22 years, I can say this is the most poorly-designed bouncer I have used. The worst part is the legs which splay way out, causing many in the family to trip over the bouncer. (I suppose that is to make sure the bouncer does not tip over, but I have never had trouble with any of my other bouncers tipping over.) Also, I am not interested in using the battery-powered vibrator, but there is no way to remove this in-the-way box from the bouncer. If you are looking for a lower-cost bouncer, I recommend Bright Stars Playful Pinwheels Bouncer.
customer_reviews.author: Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this seat.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect seat for our three month old baby. We got it because she is starting to get bored in her boppy because she can’t see enough around her. The incline is about right, and she feels like she’s hanging out with us. The bounce also sends her to sleep gently which is a bonus. It’s also very easy to assemble and well made. The seat supports hart neck so that it doesn’t tilt forward or sideways. She can support her head a little better now but I imagine this would have worked for her at a younger age. Price is right and it’s a simple but well made product. I’d recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R.

customer_reviews.title: A life saver!
customer_reviews.text: The toy bar is a little high for my 1 month old to reach atm but hes not really focusing on toys too much right now anyways. My husband and I being able to manually bounce this is a life saver, from day 1 it was a success before we even put batteries in it. Vibration is good and strong and put him asleep right away and surface is easy to wipe down and clean if there are any accidents. Great for toting him around the house so I can get stuff done and he can be near me. Great for a colicky baby that likes to be upright and likes movement to be soothed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Easy bouncer
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this bouncer worked for my son. I removed the hanging toys for the first 2 or 3 months because he just wasn't interested and it was easier for him to see me. The vibration isn't strong at all, but i didn't use it ofter as my son did not like to vibrate. My son is 3 months and I still use this seat today. I'll probably have another month to use it since he is getting long and his feet hang over the edge a little. But I gave the product 5 stars because its inexpensive and it does what it needs to do. i'm able to sit my son in it and clean/make bottles and other chores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST baby bouncer
customer_reviews.text: 100 stars for this baby bouncer! I had a very fussy baby and due to acid reflux he needed to be slightly upright most of the day to avoid spitting up and a lot of crying. We used this chair everyday all day for months. If baby woke up and wouldn't go back to sleep, we would bounce him. After meals, we would gently bounce him. As he got older he figured out how to bounce the chair and would go wild in it, he just loved it. The saddest day was when he exceeded the weight limit for it, we all miss the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Elizabeth Urim

customer_reviews.title: Not safe!
customer_reviews.text: The bar with the toys does not snap in all the way. When I noticed this I called the company and they said it was intentional- as a safety feature so one wouldn’t carry the bouncer with the baby in it by the bar. When my baby was 3 months he was able to kick strong enough that the bar fell off a few times and once fell on him and he started crying. I returned the product with no problems. I forgot to include the batter/vibrating piece and if the seller is able to contact me I am happy to send it back but had to way on contacting you. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerAN

customer_reviews.title: Great bounce chair
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for a couple months now and it’s fantastic. Super lightweight, easy to move, easy to clean. Baby loves it. I use it to get a few minutes to eat or shower. Can bring it right in the bathroom with me. My husband uses it to rock the baby to sleep at night. Note that it is not safe for sleeping- we bounce baby to sleep then once she’s out we transfer her to her crib. Overall great product, we will miss it when baby outgrows it for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: sunnydaze

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher very poor quality. Ours has several sharp flecks of metal stuck to the surface in and out, the rivets where the handle is attached are visible and discolored (ugly), there is a smear of something black and semi-permanent under the lip and the surface already shows small scratches from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H.

customer_reviews.title: Using all over the house
customer_reviews.text: There are so many expensive bouncers, swing, gliders, etc out there now - but with both my kids, this type bouncer was preferred. From the early days, where you just get them to nap in them (thankful for vibration and the ability to bounce it a little yourself) to playing with the toys, you 100% get your money's worth on these! It's easy to carry outside or upstairs as well - we use it all over the house.
customer_reviews.author: KTG

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I am, admittedly, the ultimate consumer of baby gear....and am not shy about buying expensive stuff if it works and makes life easier. That being said, this is the best $20 you will spend! We have alllll the big name expensive rockers, bouncers, etc. We purchased this as our boat/beach bouncer since it was cheap and lightweight (and for $20 if it didn't work or got destroyed we wouldn't be upset) and it ended up being a favorite of our son over all the other expensive items. If you're on a budget, or even if you're not, don't let the price or trappings of the fancy baby gear deter you...this is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Easy to strip for decontamination.
customer_reviews.text: I put this together by myself within about 5 minutes, while texting a friend for solidarity and trying to talk my 3-month old out of a total meltdown. The negotiation went poorly, but the meltdown was short-lived because I had this bouncer ready for action by the time things got desperate. The toys are interesting enough during play time, and it's easy to remove them once baby starts getting sleepy enough to nod off. The vibration is gentle and the batteries last a long time. The cover is also super easy to remove and throw in the wash when that diaper inevitably fails.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Sigrest

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in my 70's. I've taken care of my children, grandchildren, and foster children. They didn't have these when I had my own babies, but I had one for the grandchildren and foster children. It doesn't have a very strong vibration, but my grandson seems to like it anyway. He looks at the colorful plastic figures, but he'd rather look at people who talk to him and look at him (which I wish people would remember about babies). It's a safe place to set him when I have stuff to do in the kitchen, and it also comes in handy for family meals when everyone is eating and it's difficult to hold a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Durable, basic, simple, very light weight, perfect. This is going to be your baby's toilet. When baby is on it, he poops very easy thanks to its positions. My wife loves it. I recomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanju

customer_reviews.title: Great chair. D battery not included.
customer_reviews.text: He loves it!! I'm tempted to knock just one star because it requires D batteries. These aren't cheap; and it's not easy to remember to shut the chair off all the time when finished with it. Usually, I go to sit him in it and it is still on. Be nice if it would shut off on it's own after a certain time, or otherwise require less expensive/more usual batteries. That being said, it's a great chair to have! Can move it anywhere in the house and sit my baby in there very content! The fabric is easy to clean and change too. The moment I sat him in the seat he was smiling right away.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Legitimately the best $$ we’ve ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: Our one month old was going through his first growth spurt and starting to fuss and need more stimulation. Our night nurse suggested getting him a bouncer. Because we had so many other (and significantly more expensive) contraptions, I was loathe to spend more money on something he would outgrow so quickly. However, seeing how inexpensive this bouncer was and the ratings, I decided to buy. Take our word for it, buy this chair! Our little one loves it, he’s secure and he sits and naps in it happy (and quiet) as a clam!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver! Our colic baby approves!
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaver! Finally something our colic baby is happy in 😊❤️ Simple but perfect chair. Our vibrations don’t have a timer which is exactly what we wanted and the vibrations are good strength and they last for 5-7 nights on 1 D battery. Our 7week old baby seems to love everything about this chair, the vibes, contour, bouncing... She has been using this chair for a few weeks now and it’s the only way she will sleep through the night. Thank you to the designer of this chair! We finally got some sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie H.

customer_reviews.title: My 2 month old LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves this bouncer! It’s super cute and was easy to put together. She’s 2 months now and at the stage where she needs entertainment but can’t do anything with toys but look at them. I can stick her in the bouncer and buy myself at least 15 mins where get myself a meal or do whatever! She loves staring at the toys and kicking her legs to make herself bounce. Highly recommend especially for the price! We use it everyday in between naps.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Carter

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Independence!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about how much I love this product or about how much my daughter loves it. I was looking for something entertaining to set my daughter down in, but she’s not into swings yet. The vibration is great and the spinning toys keep her entertained. She’s just starting to be able to reach the toys, but before I was able to take the bar off and hold it closer for her when she’d get frustrated. I’d recommend this to anyone with a baby who doesn’t like being put down and doesn’t enjoy a swing. Now she can have some independent time and she LOVES the spinning monkey.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the expensive bouncers, swings, mamaroo etc that I own....my child loves this bouncer the most. At only 3 months old, my child can sit for at least 15-20 minutes at a time playing in this bouncer. So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Need for a newborn!!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our newborn! If offered support for his neck, and he loves the vibration feature. It is great for when I need to get dishes, etc. done. Now that our son is 3 months old, we put the mobile on it and he loves to bounce in it and loves that he can sit up to look around the room. It is much more versatile than a swing and easy to carry from room to room or travel with. The cover easily comes off to throw in the wash and dries quickly. The material is great and can easily be wiped off if your baby spits up.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri L Williams

customer_reviews.title: This was $24 when I bought it which was the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was $24 when I bought it which was the main reason I got it. My baby likes it. Only Complaint I have is that it doesn’t have many features. All it does is vibrate the seat. I wish it had a more interactive toy bar and played music, but you get what you pay for. My daughter likes it though. My mother in law just got the baby Einstein’s bouncer seat for her house, and my daughter really enjoys that one! Has more features too.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Ugh my son loves this chair but he bounces so much the wire legw have gotten weak and hes almost laying backwards in it now. But he loves it so we ordered another once since its so cheap. The photo shows how far back he leans now, kind of hard to tell from the pic. It’s suppose to be sitting up, it used to sit so far up we could feed him baby food sitting in it, now he falls asleep in it cause its so reclined lol
customer_reviews.author: Mttol

customer_reviews.title: Works great for our daughter!
customer_reviews.text: Because she is our 5th child, we're no stranger to these vibrating bouncy chairs. After 4 boys, ours have all been bent or otherwise destroyed... it really put up the good fight. They're all essentially built the same with steel frames and slip-on covers. This one is about the same with a few tweaks from the previous ones we owned. Works great and the sitting angle is very good. I am not a huge fan of the vibrating component because of eating batteries, but they really do calm down a newborn/baby!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Bouncer is good but the metal bar may hurt your baby
customer_reviews.text: This is great bouncer...colors are nice. The toys are also good & reachable to the baby so that he/she can learn touching & playing with them. My 3 month old baby is moving alot & most of the time he hits the bar which has toys hanging on it. That is a metal bar & i am afraid it will hurt him so i am trying to cover it up with some sheets..or dont use at all sometimes when he is full excited. I didn't like this metal bar at all. They should have made it with some other material so that it won't hurt babies.
customer_reviews.author: Meera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: My Bub is 8 weeks old. I bought this little bouncer for him because I'm working from home during the pandemic. I found that this bouncer takes up less space than the other option we were going to go with. I can put him on my desk, behind my laptop and keep an eye on him during meetings. It is a bit more reclined than his swing chair so it seems to be more comfortable for sleeping. I highly recommend this little chair. It's inexpensive and my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud motor noise
customer_reviews.text: Less than a month after buying the product, the bouncer started making a very loud noise when turned on. It was not possible to get a product replacement so I basically wasted my money buying this product. Stay away from it!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought sooner!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver as an additional place to set baby down to play while you inevitably have to do other things (i.e. shower, eat food, fold the endless amounts of laundry). It is easy to move from room to room, easy to travel with, keeps baby entertained and can be used longer than I expected. My son is 6 months and he still loves it, wish I had purchased sooner - he became bored with his swing and boppy so this is nice to add to the rotation. For the price point, it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Gerace

customer_reviews.title: My picky baby likes it!
customer_reviews.text: My baby really enjoys this. She hates most everything... and she really likes being here. She’s 3 months old. We clip on extra toys and that great too because the can’t reach the others just yet. I will say it’s a little awkward how you have to put them in because you have to go around the toy bar. Yea it comes off but not super easily. The fabric of the material is really nice too. Not cheap. Takes D Battery which I wish I paid attention to before buying so I could have one ready.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: After trying the mamaroo with disappointing results (my baby hated it), I decided to try a much cheaper bouncer. This little thing is amazing. My son is now almost five months old and he absolutely loves it. The vibration is a nice feature which helps calm him down and sometimes help him fall asleep. He enjoys batting at the hanging toys, and like holding on to the frame the toys are attached to (probably because of the vibration). The chair bounces whenever he kicks which is another added bonus. It is lightweight and easy to move around the house which is convenient for seeing baby wherever you are. Batteries seem to last forever, even with every day use. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lecranium

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable bouncer - please use an anti-flathead pillow with it though!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for an affordable bouncer to keep in the dining room for our little guy when he was firsr born. We didn’t put the toy rack up for ease of taking baby in and out of it. I highly recommend using a boppy noggin nest of similar flathead pillow with this to prevent flattening of baby’s head. We learned the hard way that baby’s heads are very susceptible to flattening and measures like pillows need to be taken to reduce risk. As always, baby needs to be monitored if using any type of pillow. Hope this helps someone reading this as we didn’t know before!
customer_reviews.author: AlysonTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My LO is almost 2mo. Until this bouncer, my arms were the only thing he’d fall asleep in. I know this isn’t for sleeping. But an afternoon snooze with me right there is harmless in my eyes. He refuses to be swaddled. The bouncing to his movements helps his arms from overreacting. Super light and not bulky means I can move it from room to room with little man in my other arm. It does have a vibration option that I haven’t even put batteries in.
customer_reviews.author: SioSqu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for an excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but positive comments for this bouncer. When we received the bouncer, it took less than five minutes to assemble. Once assembled, our infant son absolutely loved it. We have a very large infant and up to this point, durability has never been an issue. The seat cover is easy to clean should your child have an accident - I put ours in the washing machine (cold/gentle cycle), then air dry. We use this product every day for a total of two hours, and we just changed the battery last week (purchased Oct. 2017.) I highly recommend the Fisher-Price Baby’s Bouncer to any parent looking for an affordable and reliable bouncer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. ValLaz

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this more than the $200 bouncer
customer_reviews.text: We bought a very expensive bouncer at a boutique and our 3-week old would scream after just a few minutes sitting in it. I bought this one out of desperation one day, and he loved it. That was nearly 4 months ago, and he still loves it and happily sits in it every night while I prep dinner. He's just now able to bat at the little toys. I tried the expensive bouncer again last night and he sat in it for less than 5 minutes before crying so we're gonna stick with this one!
customer_reviews.author: asoon

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A VERIFIED POOP CHAIR! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: If you want your baby to poop because they are getting cranky, BUY THIS CHAIR! My friend told me to get this chair because every time she puts her babies in it they poop. I got mine in the mail today and after assembly we put our son in it and not even 10 minutes later he took a giant crap! It’s a vibrating poop chair! I think it’s the position their legs are in and maybe the combination with the vibrations? Idk. We are happy with the new poop chair. This is a must buy for new moms.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Dalton

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: I've received 5 of these bouncy seats, 4 of which were damaged. All the seats are smashed on the right hand side making assembly impossible. I ordered replacements 3 times, all of which had the same damage. I finally had to contact Fisher-Price directly to resolve the issue. They are working on it now. Seems Amazon received a bad batch of these, and all are damaged. Avoid the headache, buy a different product!
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Essential!
customer_reviews.text: An essential baby item. We try not to use “things” for our baby to spend time in so he builds core muscles on the floor, but sometimes you get a little desperate, and this bouncer totally does the trick. Our son really only cared for the vibration feature when he was 2+ months, but now that he is 4 months he could care less about vibration but totally loves the play bar. Price for entertainment ratio is absolutely worth it for this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to put the baby down
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I hoped it would be and so much cheaper than the alternatives. Somewhere easy to put the baby down in whatever room I'm in that keeps him a little upright but lets him sleep. I wasn't sure the baby-powered rocking would work but it really does create the perfect gentle rocking motion. The toy bar is nice for something to look at and grab at. I don't use any of the battery-powered features.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Practical, affordable, LIFESAVER
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! TOTALLY RECOMMEND. We had tons of baby products, but probably used this the most. So portable, useful, etc. I wished I had it even earlier. When he was a newborn, this was especially a lifesaver bcuz he didn’t like his expensive fancy swing etc. I loved that I could move this from room to room with me, and it was safe to put him in after a feeding if needed. It was also easy to throw in the car and take with us somewhere. The vibration feature didn’t do much, but our baby didn’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bouncer, Bought it twice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bouncer for my daughter to keep at daycare. This bouncer is wonderful for the money. My daughter loves it and I feel safe knowing that it has a 40lb weight limit, so she can bounce the day away. The pad is easy to remove and wash. The vibration is not strong but since it is only one setting, I would prefer it to be a low vibration. I love this bouncer so much that I bought another just to keep at grandmas house during our twice a year visits. You really cannot beat the price, especially with the coupon.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dumpling

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous bouncer for amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous bouncer for amazing price!! My daughter loves it and has really grown with it! Put her in it at 3 months and she’s 5 months now and she’s still a fan! Took it on vacay with us, assembly is easy! Feed her in it, play with her in it and it babysits her for the moments when running out of the room is necessary really quick. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Varley

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve heard moms tell me this is a waste of money. I absolutely disagree. My son loves his bouncer. I can feed him in it, he sleeps in it and it’s so light I can use it anywhere in the house. We take it everywhere we go. Even if we are going to be out for only an hour, I like being able to put him down if I need to. Buy this. You won’t regret it. We don’t use the toy bar though, my baby doesn’t like it
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hornbuckle

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel
customer_reviews.text: We got this for traveling. We were looking for something that breaks down flat to put in a checked suitcase, and, unassembled, this worked perfect. It’s very basic—the bounce isn’t great, but it’s totally adequate for containing a baby and occasionally bouncing to sleep. The toys on the toy bar are also underwhelming, but we just hang other dangling toys around the fixed ones. It would be fine as a primary bouncer too.
customer_reviews.author: yop

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This is our 4th vibrating seat. At first we were buying ones for how they looked and matched our living room, but that was a huge mistake. We spent tons of money on seats and they were either flaky or they didn't vibrate strong enough for our baby. This seat was so cheap but he loves it. The vibration works every time we turn it on and it is strong enough to relax him. He always wants to be in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in addition to one we already had for our twins and I seriously considered getting rid of the other one to have two of this one. These bouncer seats are a life saver with newborns, but this one is such a great design compared to others I've seen! The seat isn't as deep as most, so the baby is laying back and a little closer to flat. This keeps them from slumping down in the seat. Also, the cloth part comes off without disconnecting any part of the frame, making it super easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I received one of these as a gift. My newborn twins liked it so much that I had to order a second one. I was happy to see that it was even cheaper this time around. The vibrations seem to calm the babies and put them to sleep. This seat is also helpful because it holds the baby in an upright position which is nice after you've fed one baby, still need to feed another one, and want to avoid spit up. I also like that the toy bar is removable.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Product came out of the box bent or something because once put together one side doesn't touch the floor unless the baby is in it. It does not sit flat on the ground if unoccupied. Seat cover was very hard to put on also and covers up the button used to turn the vibrating function on.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Burks

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this bouncer chair! We originally bought a bigger $50 fancy one with a mobile above it but she hated it because it layed her back too far so she couldn't look around. This one was under $25 and she loves it! We usually keep the removable toy bar off because she wants to look around. This bouncer is lightweight and easy to move from room to room and she loves sitting in it while I shower, do dishes, and clean
customer_reviews.author: Richard N. Whitecar

customer_reviews.title: Great, simple chair
customer_reviews.text: What a nice, simple little chair! It’s a seat with vibration only (no melodies or sounds). It has a belt buckle that is easy and quick to get on and off. This seat actually inclines more than other bouncer seats I’ve had which is great for babies who spit up a lot after eating. It also doesn’t have “sides” on it, so the baby is able to see out on each side when they turn their head.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite baby purchase by far. My first child would soothe in the swing easy but my daughter hated her swing. Tried this and she loves it. You can easily bounce them in this for hours without your arm giving out lol I bring this everywhere too. All family gatherings, we bring this along and she’ll just hang out in there the whole time. I’m currently barely tapping my foot to the edge of it and bouncing her while I type this! Super easy!
customer_reviews.author: bri plessner

customer_reviews.title: Best baby purchase
customer_reviews.text: After the rock n play hit the trash we needed a new place to sit the baby down if we needed to do things around the house. Our baby LOVES this bouncy seat. He doesn't ever sleep in it but loves his awake time in it. He loves to look at the toy bar and kicks his legs whenever he is in it. We don't use the vibration feature so I can't comment on that. He is now eating solids and sometimes we stick him in the seat and sit on the floor to feed him. Being able to remove the seat pad is great so it can be washed after a messy eating session.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Durable. I am using it on my second child although I was warned that these less expensive bouncy chairs usually last for one child. The fabric slips off the frame easily for cleaning. Battery seems to last forever - my toddler will turn it on and I won't notice until much later when I go to put my infant in it and see that it's vibrating. It's light and easy to move around. Such a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Karbear

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves her Butt Massager
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this chair. It was about the only thing that would sooth her during her colicy phase. Cheap and easy to assemble, this thing saved my sanity multiple times. Would highly recommend this to anyone that is looking into purchasing it. Also buy a lot of D batteries because you'll go through them (my daughter lived in this chair pretty much so it was on 17 hours a day for a time).
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Simple Bouncer for Baby!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 2 month old godson. He loved it! It’s best to put baby in with the toy bar off because it makes it a little hard when it’s attached. The bar is easy enough to remove and replace. Once the vibration was on, baby was excited and happy. It’s not too much vibration, just enough. The seat is not adjustable, which would be good for older babies but the decline in perfect for a newborn. Easy to install, took about 5 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this bouncer! It’s the first day of using it and I feel it’s already paid for itself. My baby hates being left alone AND she loves to be bounced. So that’s why the bouncer is perfect for HER. I’ve realized with this second baby that not every product is right for every baby. The toy bar is a joke for sure though I don’t mind because I love the bouncer so much. It’s good quality super easy to put together. Also it’s really responsive/ easy to bounce with hand or foot.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney A Fetterman

customer_reviews.title: Great place for the baby to sit and play when you need to put him down securely.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to place my baby in when I need to do something or to rest after a bottle. He loves to play in this and its very easy to move around wherever I need it. It is strong and has had no issues. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: MSG

customer_reviews.title: It was a great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend. I heard they liked it and it helps the baby to stop crying nonstop for no apparent reason. Ha! Diaper changed. Check. Fed and burped. Check. Lots of love and attention. Check. Still crying and about to lose your mind? Chair saves the day! You’re welcome! If you love your friends and would like to save their sanity? Get this chair for them!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies under 1 year.  Simple, Makes baby happy by reaching for rotating toys.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves to bounce his legs so he rocks up and down. Just a little vibration. He has figured out he can make this happen. He loves reaching up for the toys that rotate above his head and just within his reach. This is a simple and logical choice as a way to put your baby down, but be assured he/she will stay in one place. Smiles from a Grandmother. !!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my newborn niece. The price was great and it shipped super quickly with prime. She’s two months old now and still uses it all the time from what I can see. Would recommend to new parents who are on a budget but need a reliable bouncer for baby. The print is very cute and gender neutral and it’s very light. Would be easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: My baby flipped over backwards in this chair.
customer_reviews.text: At first I really liked this chair for our little one, but he it's now 6 months old and not sitting up yet, but he it's very wiggly and this had become a safety hazard and I can no longer use the chair. He flipped himself upside down in the chair, head over feet while strapped in and since the chair folded over him. I would not recommend this chair for any baby over a few months. I looked at the weight recommendations and it stated 20lbs. My baby is only 16lbs. Really disappointed because this chair was so easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Howe

customer_reviews.title: One of Our Best Baby Purchases
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING. Our baby hates being put down on anything flat; in her infant car seat, she can't see what's around her, and she hates that, too. This bouncer is cheap, sturdy, and lets us put her down for hours at a time. She enjoys the vibrations and the toy bar as well. Along with our dekor diaper pail, this is at the top of our list for best purchases, and certainly we're getting a huge return on our investment in terms of hours of peace and baby relaxation.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ames

customer_reviews.title: best bouncer we had
customer_reviews.text: We had a little foster baby that loved this bouncer more than any of the other fancier swings and rockers. I was reluctant to buy it at first because we already had a few vibrating/ rocking chairs, but this one did the trick! It also is lightweight, doesn't have a huge footprint, which is great in our small house (with all the other baby gear around). I would recommend it in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect for newborn through about four or five months of ...
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect for newborn through about four or five months of age. Then you'll have to use the seatbelt. Might still be good for a few more months. Of course you can't let the baby sit in for too long before they get bored and wrestless, but frees up enough time to do a few chores.
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: Budget friendly and worth it
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a budget friendly bouncer chair to try for baby and found this online. Figured the price was way better than most so took a chance and ordered it. It’s now one of our baby’s favorite toys out of everything she has!! She really likes the vibration and angle of the chair, and bounces herself when she kicks. She’s 4 months now and we’ve had it over a month. Well worth the money over some of the fancier bouncers in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jina Yoo

customer_reviews.title: Buy This!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing that I bought for my newborn other than the Owlet Smart Sock Monitor 3rd Gen. My baby is 6 weeks old tomorrow and loves taking naps in this bouncer. He didn’t like the expensive $220 MommaRoo thing that I bought but for some reason loves this cheap bouncer! I got it for two of my friends and they both rave about it as well.
customer_reviews.author: EndlessSummer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver, poop maker!
customer_reviews.text: I love that is lightweight and simple. Baby LOVES to bounce in it and it allows me to do stuff while baby is entertained. A poop is also guaranteed when he sits there, so I can anticipate the bowel movement. It can be easily washed too which is a must. I don't know what will I do when baby outgrows it. Just a word of caution, watch carefully when putting on the safety straps, the leg skin can get caught on the buckle and pinch baby's skin. If it happens, the entire neighborhood will hear the screaming.
customer_reviews.author: MJ's Girl

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Bouncer.
customer_reviews.text: I used this exact model when my oldest was a baby 8 years ago. Our second baby used the same one a year later. When I had our third six years after that...I was on the hunt for this bouncer. I was so happy they still made it. It’s the best one! It’s easy to bounce with one foot, the vibration is great, and it’s so easy to move all around the house. The cover washes well and the toy bar is a good addition. Our third daughter is three months old and it’s her favorite place to sit! Highly recommend. (I also got it for an absolute STEAL around Christmas)
customer_reviews.author: LBW

customer_reviews.title: Look no further ...
customer_reviews.text: They are ones that look fancier or cost more money but don’t waste your money! This chair/bouncer is it! My LO uses this at 10 weeks of age with no problem. She loves to track the mobile play items but she also likes for me to unsnap the mobile off so she can nap and or watch her Disney movies. These are such a nice price I was able to buy one for home and one for grandparents house.
customer_reviews.author: Littlenaturalist

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bounce for my baby girl. She is 3 months old and 12 pounds. It's very easy to put together but if you want to take it with you on a trip you will need a screwdriver . Although she isn't big enough to bounce herself in it , I do it for her and she loves it's . She also loves the toy bar it comes with. This chair also vibrates but does not come with the d battery needed .
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment! First it has two stains on the seat-maybe ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE I take most of it back. The stains are legit but the rattling stopped (assuming human error when it was put together!!) and my baby loves it! What a disappointment! First it has two stains on the seat-maybe rust? And it makes an awful racket on top of the vibration noise
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, lightweight, vibration stops working after a while
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - easy to assemble - light weight and easy to move. I place my son on the chair and can move him with me so that he can see me while i'm working in the kitchen. Cons: - seat is a bit small. It can afford up to 20lbs but it is already too small for my son now. He is only 17lbs. - vibration stops working after a month use from time to time. - toy bar is hard to reach for the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Good bouncer to relax in
customer_reviews.text: Update- now that my son is 3 months old, he enjoys this bouncer. He likes the monkey and smiles at it all the time. Still doesn’t need the vibration, but still a good buy. . My son only sits in it for 15 minutes, max. He doesn’t care for the vibration too much. But for the price , we were ok keeping it and letting him rotate between the bouncer and swing.
customer_reviews.author: hbn45

customer_reviews.title: Best $20 (now $40) I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this! He just turned 3 months and I wish we'd had it all along. I don't use the vibration feature -- I worry that too much of that will hinder his ability to self-soothe -- but he loves the incline and watching the toys spin on the toy bar. I ordered a second one to keep at his grandparents' house. Best $20 (now $40) I ever spent!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Sassano

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for twins!!
customer_reviews.text: I never had bouncers with my first two babies, but when I found out we were having twins, so many twin parents online recommended bouncers! So I skeptically ordered these, and I now couldn’t recommend them more! I don’t know what I did with my single babies without a bouncer haha but these have been such a lifesaver with our twins! They are so light and stack easily! My four month olds have used them everyday since they were born! It helped a ton when I had to do bottles for both babies alone, and now is great for just hanging out! You won’t regret buying this!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this bouncer. Got it when my little one was about 4 weeks old, we've been using is for 3 weeks now and it's been a lifesaver. Not only do we have another place to put her, but she even falls asleep in it. We are able to transport it all around the house and I can finally get some things done and for the price you really can't go wrong it's a simple straight to the point design. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and economical.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bouncer for the price. I bought it for my baby grandson who stays with me twice a week. I like the subtle colors (looks classy, not bright/ cartoon like). This will be a lifesaver for me because my grandson is heavy already! It sits at just the right angle. Slightly upright so baby can look around and helps with his reflux problems.
customer_reviews.author: CatnipAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Price. Great Option
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a bouncer for a holiday weekend and picked this up because the price point was good. Shipped it to the vacation house, easily assembled in 10 min and she has truly been happy sitting in this bouncer with or without the toys. Lightweight for moving around the house and giving a parent some free hands now and again. Very happy with the purchase and would recommend for an affordable bouncer. My baby is 13lbs and still has plenty of room to grow with this item.
customer_reviews.author: mermie

customer_reviews.title: Not for short babies
customer_reviews.text: My baby is 3mos old. She is enjoying this bouncer! My problem is the pole with toys. My baby is having a hard time reaching the toys. My husband decided to bend the pole a little so my baby can reach & play the toys.
customer_reviews.author: Grazy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't bounce as name would suggest
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the description better so ultimately it's my bad, but the name of the seat has bouncer in it. So I assumed it would bounce the baby with the batteries in. It does not. I dont know what the purpose of the vibration is, and it was very weak. Not really worth the money, had I known better I would have spent a little extra on something that actually bounced.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Grotton

customer_reviews.title: Super handy!
customer_reviews.text: This little chair is the perfect place to put my newborn while I shower and such. He’s so comfy and I can keep an eye on him. He usually just naps. We’ve also used it outside in the shade. It’s been great. I bought a boppy head pillow that sits perfectly in it too. I took off the little toys but maybe will use them when he’s a bit older. The one thing I don’t like is that it’s hard to move around with him in it. I know it’s not meant to do that, but it would be handy. It makes me miss the recalled rock n play but this is a good replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Walz

customer_reviews.title: Nice and simple
customer_reviews.text: Update: my son is two months old now and we are putting this seat to good use. The vibration setting is great, I’ve forgotten to turn it off MANY times and for long periods sometimes and the battery is still going strong. He just started reacting to the toys when they’re attached as well. I do wish that the seat wasn’t so reclined but other than that. Can’t say how my son likes it since he’s not born yet but it’s a really nice, affordable little bouncer and was super simple to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Tori and Cole

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I like the pattern (I got this to match her rock 'n play) and the easy assembly, but the bouncer is flimsy. I have a kicker, and I'm worried about her hurting her feet since the padding is minimal (her feet rest on top of the switch box). When she kicks, the whole thing jumps. My baby bjorn bouncer is built more sturdy than this (and I prefer it to this bouncer, but my baby doesn't like that one either).
customer_reviews.author: EMN2xU

customer_reviews.title: Simple, but loved by both of kids!
customer_reviews.text: So I have owned 2 of these. My first absolutely loved it. With my second we got fancier seat that rocked and played music. She would rather be held and bounced. We got out this bouncy seat and she loved it. We use it every day to get her tired for her naps and bed. It does rub on the back of her head and gave her a bald spot, but she's so happy bouncing in it. We haven't used the vibration for her, but it really helped my first poop :)
customer_reviews.author: Skully23

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - don’t spend more
customer_reviews.text: A bouncer is a wonderful thing to have. One of the first thing each of my 3 boys loved. Once they hit 20 lbs or 5 mo that I think the bouncer is a bit limited but for little guys it’s great. This is how you will get dressed, take a shower, etc. very easy to move around the house, take to grandma’s etc. this model is all you need. Don’t be fooled into spending more.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: We call this "the pooping chair"
customer_reviews.text: This thing is magic - put your gassy/fussy baby down and in no more than five minutes they will be relieved. If you're a parent you know why this is so phenomenal. When my son is clearly uncomfortable we just sit him in this chair and he poops almost EVERY time. It's amazing! Beyond being our go-to for going #2 (sorry, not sorry) this is a great, lightweight bouncer. Truly a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: paperTlGER

customer_reviews.title: A baby must-have!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned one of these with every child of mine and it’s a must-have! My babies spend a lot of time in their bouncy chair. I never put batteries in there so I can’t rate that part but it’s good to rock your baby to sleep (bounce with your hand or foot) or just to keep your baby in while you get stuff done around the house. Forget about all the expensive seats, this is the one you need. The gray looks cute, gender-neutral. My youngest baby (#4) is a big baby, at 4 months he’s over 19 lbs and long and he’s outgrowing it now sadly.
customer_reviews.author: I. D. M.

customer_reviews.title: Fun. He bounced a bit
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality. Fun. He bounced a bit, but couldn't reach the toys until he was almost too big for it. We hung other toys from the bar. My son liked it until around 4 months. Then he hated being strapped in and would lean forward trying to push himself out. For a while, we kept this in the bathroom so he could stay with me, but I could set him down in a safe, fun place. (At that point he spit up when he was laid flat. Now we can just lay him on the rug and have a couple of toys there.)
customer_reviews.author: Julianne

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bouncer for the price, my only issue is that the vibration is very weak. With a brand new battery(not included), it maybe was semi powerful for about ten minutes before it began to fade. Assembly was easy, it handles well, the toy bar is easy to put on and take off, and it’s lightweight to move around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: just buy it , you need it & so does your baby
customer_reviews.text: When your crying because your baby is crying and you don’t know how to get her or him to stop you buy this. My daughter LOVES is she’ll sit in it for a long time and be entertained - happy baby is happy mom & dad. Also this isn’t really a “girl” color but who cares cause the “girl” color one was like $40 - no thanks this one works the same
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves her bouncer
customer_reviews.text: This bouncer is great and can’t beat the price. I don’t love the optional toys bc of how they attach to the seat. They snap in place and jut out a bit which doesn’t look 100% safe for little fingers. Overall this is a great product for the price, and our baby’s stage as we would not leave her unsupervised so the risk of any finger pinching is a non-issue. Super easy to assemble as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Lyons

customer_reviews.title: great newborn purchase!
customer_reviews.text: our son used this from 2-6 months. he loved chilling in this and bouncing up and down. one of the only baby items that made him truly happy when he was 2-3. i'd highly recommend this especially if you have a baby who loves to be held and you need a moment to do something with your hands, like empty the dishwasher. i wish he could still use it by his poundage is higher than what is recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Seeling

customer_reviews.title: Very entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Waited too many weeks before get this! I was using a Boppy pillow and my little boy was not enjoying how low/reclined he was sitting in it. He likes how high he sits in this and is entertained by the bouncing and toys! I like that I can move it anywhere with him in it. Even outside!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: The only baby item you need!
customer_reviews.text: Miracle bouncer-thats what we called this! Its simple and only does "basic" things but man is this worth every penny. First-its a steal at this price AND it calmed and occupied my baby SO much better than all of those fancy expensive swings and gadgets. New parents or seasoned parents who are expecting buy this!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Every baby needs a bouncer chair
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Nice level of vibration. Easy to take with you, wherever you go, so your little one has a comfy place to sit and relax
customer_reviews.author: CappTechTop Contributor: Photography

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Baby's Bouncer Geo Meadow
product_meta.description: Style:Geo MeadowGet busy relaxing (and playing) with Baby’s Bouncer; The seat gently bounces in response to baby’s natural motions. A press of a button adds calming vibrations, too. When it’s time to play, three animal friends on the toy bar encourage baby to reach and grasp (exercising developing motor skills), bat (encouraging development of eye-hand coordination), and play (which is just plain fun)!
feature_bullets: Item arrives in frustration free, easy to open packaging that’s 100% recyclable; For a gift ready box, select “Ship in Amazon packaging” at checkout
Bouncy seat for soothing and entertaining
Switch on calming vibrations to help soothe
Removable toy bar with spinning monkey with rollerball, lion and zebra spinners
Soft, padded, machine washable fabric seat pad

specifications.Additional product features: Detachable toy bar, machine washable seat pad, calming vibrations
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars5,863 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
